alert.note: Alert for Auglaize; Hardin; Union (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 6:38PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN SHELBY, LOGAN, NORTHEASTERN AUGLAIZE, HARDIN COUNTIES IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO AND NORTHWESTERN UNION COUNTIES IN CENTRAL OHIO THROUGH 715 PM EDT... At 637 PM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Ada to Jackson Center, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Winds may arrive well ahead of any rain. Locations impacted include... Bellefontaine, Kenton, Ada, Anna, Jackson Center, Forest, Russells Point, Lakeview, Dunkirk, Alger, Waynesfield, Belle Center, West Mansfield, Chippewa Park, Northwood, Blanchard, Roundhead, Mount Victory, Rushsylvania and McGuffey. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
